TopicTitle: Sparks when sliding across the surface, and smoke and flames coming out of craft when craft is damaged

Articles.Content:
When you slide on the surface of a planet or object or hit something, then, I think that there should be some sparks when moving across the surface like the old KSP 1 mod, Collision FX:

I also think that when a craft is damaged in a fuel tank area or an engine, smoke and flames should come out when flying or falling. The flame effect could work only in atmospheres and there could be a different effect when in space. This can be like the KSP 1 mod Destruction FX: 

Both these mods added more immersion in the game and were a visual way of telling you that your craft was damaged and that you need to revert back to the VAB. It was nice to see, so I hope devs see this and consider adding some visual effects like this in the game. I do remember in the KSP 2 Feature Video Next Gen Tech, where there was a shot that showed smoke and flames coming out of some fuel tanks while falling. This was at the timestamp of 5:51 here:

Thanks to whoever is reading this!

To add onto this thread, maybe an overhaul for the explosions (like flames spewing out of fuel tanks when the craft they are in explodes) and a fix to the SRB plumes, as they look like they are attached to the rocket like a part.
